title: AMAZING SPECIALS!! THESE WON'T LAST LONG, SO HURRY!
posting_body: ['Special: $500 off 1st full mo w/12+mo', 'LNL', '1 bedrooms starting at $1,445', '2 bedrooms starting at $2,020', '3 bedrooms starting at $2,551', 'Private Detached Garages($125/Mo), Dog Park, Free Wifi Areas, Game/Sport Room, Bus Stop, Club House, School Bus Stop, Carports, Business Center, Fitness Center, 2 Pools, Picnic Area, Outdoor Grills, Electric Car Chargers, Door To Door Trash Pickup', 'Premium Appliances, Non-Carpeted Flooring, Ceiling Fans, Hi-Speed Internet, Garden/Large Tubs, Walk-In Showers, Self Cleaning Ovens, Cable Ready, Miniblinds, W/D Machines, Premium Countertops, Attached Garages, Private Patios/Balconies, Microwaves, Ice Makers, Dishwashers, Garbage Disposals, Frost Free Refrigerators, Walk-In Closets, Storage Closet Outside', '1 SOURCE APARTMENT LOCATORS', 'Top Rated locator service with 500+ Five star reviews.', 'OUR SERVICE IS FREE!', 'We can help with Second Chance on Select Properties (Broken Leases, Property Debt, Evictions, Bankruptcy, Felonies and Misdemeanors)', 'Free Move or Cash Rebate on all qualifying properties', 'PHONE: 2.1.4.3.9.6.6.7.6.8', 'TEXT: 9.7.2.5.4.4.4.4.5.7', 'Refer to Apt#1777C']
